item.title: Portfolio
item.description:
Aren Desai is a Computer Science / Data Science dual major at the University of Wisconsin, currently completing his senior year. You can view his code on his github.

Here is my resume (with my address taken out of course).

Notable Projects

Hourly Dispatch Simulator - MGE

While I can’t post the code due to company policy, I developed a highly efficient simulator of the Blount Generating Station for Madison Gas & Electric.
